#include<stdio.h>
main()
{
      int t;
      scanf("%d",&t);
      while(t--)
      {
                int n;
                scanf("%d",&n);
                int a,b;
                a=(4*n)*(4*n - 1)*(4*n -2);
                a=a/6;
                b=n*(n-1)*(n-2)*4;
                b=b/6;
                if(n<3)
                printf("%d\n",a);
                else
                printf("%d\n",a-b);
      }
}
